Html:
Is it possible for the end user to enter/modify custom weight values based on min/max settings?

Example:

I would like RARW to calculate Armor Pen as my number one stat when my overall Armor Pen is less then 300, then after my total Armor Pen is 300, I want it to value Agility higher than Armor Pen.

No.  Rawr does not use stat weightings at all.  Do a search of "Stat weight" (upper right hand corner is a search box) and note the reasonings / how it does work / why we don't need to use stat weightings in Rawr.
Will do.  Thanks for the quick post.

Many modules have optional optimizer settings that might do this for you. In the Optimizer window, look in Additional Requirements, and see if you can add one for Armor Pen greater than or equal to 300. However, that's assuming you still want to do this after reading what BrWarner suggested.
